XBMC allows many options for your video library and playback including[CR]subtitles, and scrapers. XBMC allows many options for your music library and playback including[CR]visualizations and even internet radio. Picture handeling can be quite easy. you can do this by adjusting display,[CR]effects, tags and timing. With XBMC you can have several profiles, even a logon screen for controlled[CR]access. Adjusting weather has never been easier than with XBMC, change location[CR]and regions here. Network settings made easy by adjusting internet, SMB, Servers and[CR]even UPnP. XBMC has many interface options that allow you to change everything[CR]from the skin or theme to region and rss feeds. Customize your xperience with setting different backgrounds, panels[CR]and stages. Toggle items in the skin and much more. Advanced hardware and usage in XBMC made simple with options like[CR]hardware, autoplay and locking.

v1.2.1 Movies TV Shows Music Pictures Settings Power Welcome to XBMC! Thanks for choosing Xperience More for your XBMC skin. This is a customized version of the Xperience GUI for XBMC Media Center. [B]Movies:[/B][CR]This button will load all Movies in your video library. [B]TV Shows:[/B][CR]This button will load all TV Shows in your library. [B]Music:[CR][/B]This button will load your music library. [B]Pictures:[/B][CR]This button will load your picture collection. [B]New Movies:[/B] [CR]This button will load your Recently Added Movies in your video library. [B]New Episodes:[/B] [CR]This button will load your Recently Added TV Epsidoes in your video library.
